message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. How about we meet closer to the middle?
I'll give in a bit, but 55 is too low for me. How about 58-42?
This is a better deal for you than the last round considering inflation. It's time to be reasonable.
Considering inflation, I think 57-43 is a fair compromise. Don't let the money lose more value!
Okay, let's stop wasting time and split this evenly.  Any more rounds and we'll both lose out significantly.
